desc: Shoparug is a direct importer of finest Quality handmade Persian Rugs. We have the largest selection of handmade rugs and hall runners online In Australia. We provide free shipping, best quality and prices. Our showroom in Booragoon, Perth is a must place to visit for rug lovers, collectors and investors.

layout.text: Now Is The Time To Bring Warmth To Your Home With A Beautiful Persian Rug For A Fraction Of Its Retail Value, Further 15% Off On Entire Collection. Free Shipping Offered!
